column4: Hey. I'm looking for a jukebox sorta thingy for my MP3 collection.. I was thinking amarok, but that's KDE and I'd like to stay GNOMEish.. What do you guys think?
The music is on a SAMBA share, so I'd like the payer to integrate well with GNOMEs networking and so forth..
I'll have a look at rhythmbox :)
You have rhythmbox and banshee for gnome
